About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Who am i?

I am a software developer based in Israel. I help convert a vision and an idea into meaningful and useful software products. Having the ability to transform requirements into a useful software.

Military Service

2017-2020 Missile technician on the Israli Navy

Full Military Service on the Israely navy Warships as a Missile technician. Responsible for the maintanance of the Missile and his systems on the ship.

Graduate from a Full Stack Web developer Course

Jhon Bryce Bootcamp 2020-2021

I learned the basics of developing web applications, and building 3 projects including a virtual store, a vacation tracking site, and a virtual currency tracking site.

sql

Computer Science Degree

2021-Now

In the Degree i am learning Algorithems and data structures, programming with JAVA and Object orianted programming. and also a lot of math :)
